website_summaries.verdict: A large, good-quality carving knife for an excellent price.
pros: Ultra-sharp blade offers high level of precision
Works with a variety of meats
cons: Some buyers received knives with nicks in the blade

customer_reviews.title: So far met expectations
customer_reviews.text: Sliced right through a brisket no problem.. just the right length knife didn’t have to lift up on to adjust to cut at another angle
customer_reviews.author: sean masseau

customer_reviews.title: Blade not straight!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m generally a knife snob, and I have 5 Global knives as my primary set...so, there’s that. I didn’t want to spend much on a slicer because a) I won’t use it a ton, and b) it’s not a very technical knife. I just needed it to be decent metal, long, and straight. The Granton edge was to be a welcome bonus. Long story short, I didn’t expect much.....but damn. My blade had both a curve and a twist, evident by initial inspection... Even at the bottom tier of price, I still expect a straight blade.
customer_reviews.author: ben davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Value.
customer_reviews.text: The knife is really a great value for home use. The knife presents well and appears to be well made. It is very sharp right out of the box. It looks much more expensive than it is and is packaged in a nice case to store the knife. I used it the other day to slice some homemade slab bacon and it cut straight and is sharp enough to make thin slices. I can’t wait to slice a prime rib roast with it. I would recommend this knife.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Cover

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't really sharp at all and the blade has a few nicks in the spine not the edge, weird.
customer_reviews.text: I have sharpened it and it does okay with slicing meat, the handle is comfortable. You would think whomever was cleaning the knife up when assembled they would try getting the nicks out of the spine to make the knife look cleaner nicer. This is a 10 dollar knife at best.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Sundstrom

customer_reviews.title: Impressive and Cost Effective Slicing Knife
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the quality and price of this slicing knife. I was looking for a slicing knife but did not want to pay 50+ dollars. The knife feels great in your hand. Used this Thanksgiving for carving three turkeys. I was able to achieve very thin slices and everyone commented that the presentation looked great. Looking forward to using this on beef brisket.
customer_reviews.author: Brian H

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Knife
customer_reviews.text: I had my first try at slicing a ham today (Easter Sunday) and found this knife to be easy to use. It is very sharp and enabled me to cut thin, uniform slices of ham while exerting just a slight bit of downward energy. The 11 inch length was long enough to slice the whole way across the ham and is about as long as I would find comfortable to use. I recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Antolik

customer_reviews.title: wish I went with the better one. Not worth the
customer_reviews.text: I was not impressed with this knife at all. I was debating between this and another that was about $20 more... wish I went with the better one. Not worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Karma Queen

customer_reviews.title: Big Bend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this knife based on the reviews and the price. I did not expect perfection from a 25 dollar knife but I did expect it to be straight. As you can see from the photo it’s quite bent. Maybe I got the 1 in a 100 that slipped by quality control. It’s heading back tomorrow and I’ve gone with a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It Works, It Works Well For the Price, But It's Not A Premium Slicer
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, feels good, cuts okay. It seems very durable, it looks and feels high quality. But I can't get the blade sharp. I mean I can get it sharp enough to cut. But with how tender my briskets are, this knife requires way more sawing than a truly sharp knife should. It'll cut, but it takes some effort. If you only need to use it once a month or less, buy this knife, it'll work. But if you're going to be slicing quite a few briskets, hams, turkeys, etc, then go ahead and invest in a higher quality knife. You'll thank me.
customer_reviews.author: Landon Evans

customer_reviews.title: Brisket hacker.....
customer_reviews.text: Proceed to checkout? Yes If you smoke brisket like me, then you need a knife. I bought 2. One to trim the fat...and one to trim the meat. This one cuts meat like a pro. The proverbial hot knife through butter. I haven't found anything wrong with it thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Philthy G

customer_reviews.title: Well Balanced and Easy to Wield
customer_reviews.text: This is a nicely constructed knife. Very sharp on arrival and razor sharp with a bit of honing. Has a nice fitted box with magnetic closure for those without an appropriate knife holder for a very long slender knife. While reasonably thin and flexible it's neither as thin or flexible as the beloved knife it replaced that disappeared last Christmas when others did the dishes. I've yet to use it for a ham but I've cut some paper thin slices of hard sausage.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W. Thies

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING BLADE
customer_reviews.text: My Dear Stephanie suggested that I get this slicing knife and use it to see what I thought. I used it and was Blown Away at its precise slicing ability. I sliced a Purple Onion thin though to read a paper through it! The only reason I didn't add that photo was due to the flash flooding the picture and the onion slice went on burger! I Bought the Ceramic Sharpening Rod and This knife is The REAL DEAL!!
customer_reviews.author: Wil Engle

customer_reviews.title: Extremely sharp knife, perfect for cutting brisket
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sharp knife. I bought it specifically for slicing brisket. I never had a knife long enough to since through the entire larger cut of meat like a brisket. With this knife I am able to cut beautiful thin slices. The knife is extremely sharp and looks great. Can’t beat it for the price. It also fit in the top slot of my knife block. If you don’t have a knife block, it comes in a nice looking case.
customer_reviews.author: Nick N.

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for 1 purpose: to slice brisket. Does it slice brisket? Paper thin to whatever thickness you want. Blade does not drag. It is super sharp and very easy to maneuver. I don't allow my wife to touch it because she likes to put everything in the dishwasher. That is terrible on the blade. It is an inexpensive knife compared to the bigger brands, but this is quality. I love my new brisket knife.
customer_reviews.author: B. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Fair value.
customer_reviews.text: Product is a fair value. It cut my prime rib with ease. I always watched the meat servers at buffets use these blades, so I wanted to try one myself. Who knows how it will hold up, but it seems well made. Two things I wish we're different. One, I wish it came with a blade cover (I keep it in the original box which is very nice). Two, the blade wasn't honed perfectly and has a slight off angle to the grind on the very tip. I'm sure it's just cosmetic, but it's noticeable. Again, the knife worked very well.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Parker

customer_reviews.title: Pleased With Purchase
customer_reviews.text: First of all I own a block full of different high end Japanese carbon steel knives that are mostly like razors so I wasn't expecting much when I ordered this. I did need a knife for the occasional brisket or ham that I cure/smoke and didn't want to spend a fortune on it. I am pleasantly surprised. Nice packaging and when I took it out of the box it looked decent but wouldn't pass the paper cutting test. I ran it down a ceramic rod a few times and tried again. That was all it took to put a nice edge. Time will tell how it holds the edge but for the price it is hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: DrA53

customer_reviews.title: You might lose a finger sharp.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely impressed with this knife for the price. Cuts brisket, ribs, etc with zero difficulty with factory sharpness. Nice weight to it, definitely not junk. I cannot stress enough how sharp this knife is. Take extra care when cleaning it. I knocked some skin off myself just by accidentally grazing against the blade while it was in the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Dull right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to receive this knife. I used it on a brisket the day it arrived. I may not cook the best brisket in the world, but this was like trying cut with a pipe. I can run my thumb over the blade with no issues. I think it was never sharpened and I'm not going to do it for them. I even tried to cut a hot dog with it and it pushed the hot dog a third of the way in before it cut it. This has nice feel to it and the tang and handle seem to be sturdy, but I will be returning it for another brand. This one is a miss.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Super sharp
customer_reviews.text: Comes in nice gift box. I bought this for my neighbor who I compete on BBQ with. It is very nice quality and super sharp that makes slicing brisket and ribs easy. Metal goes through handle so this will last years. I bought a cheaper one for myself but will probably buy another one of these to keep as it's better quality for a great price. Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Johnson

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: An affordable carving knife that won't disappoint. Shipping was fast and the stainless steel blade arrived sharp and sliced up 2 tri-tips beautifully right out of the box. I highly recommend this if you want a nice carving knife without hurting your wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Kole H.

customer_reviews.title: BE CAREFUL - very sharp
customer_reviews.text: this knife cut through brisket like butter - very sharp - while washing the knife and drying with paper towels, knife went through 2 layers of paper towels and really cut my finger. Thought i was going to need stitches but bleeding stopped. Very sharp and easy to hold. Knife s great value
customer_reviews.author: apopnj

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Waited a while to leave this review because I wanted to like it despite the fact it came with a bend in the blade where the blade meets the handle. After 2 uses it had already dulled significantly and after a couple more, I’ve decided to throw this knife away. There are better options out there and I recommend you find one.
customer_reviews.author: Danimalpm

customer_reviews.title: Nice blade
customer_reviews.text: Coming from a nitpicky knifemaker, the edge could have been better. Mine had a few knicks in the edge which will be annoying to sharpen out. I do not see this as a fault of the product but a fault of the employee applying the edge. Other than that I love it. The handle is nice and tight. The blade is thin and sharpened up to the blunt tip so carving was easy. The case is nice. I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Skipworth Family

customer_reviews.title: Not as sharp as I had hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: Knife is good quality and is well made. The edge was rough and not sharp enough to cut cold smoked salmon as received. I spent an hour with diamond hones to shape and sharpen the edge to a reasonable cutting shape. This knife is really too stiff for skinning and slicing salmon fillets but I can use it for briskets.
customer_reviews.author: Scuba Dog

customer_reviews.title: Well made for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I needed for slicing large cuts of meat. Its sharp and thick enough to not bend yet thin enough to get through a dense rare roast. For me, it's a great price for a purposeful knife. I dont know how it will hold up to daily use, but if that's what you need. seems you should buy a chef durable brand.
customer_reviews.author: Spanker

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work well for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Needed a jerky knife and internet search recommended this. After 1 use, compared to my Wusthof / comparably priced. This cuts same or better. Will reassess after months of use. Had my eye on the $120++ Japanese layered knives. Kinda glad I bought this the savings is 5 to 1 at least. I will take care of this and hopefully it will last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Conlin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing knife. Amazing value.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. What a great knife! I had bought this knife because I was cooking a 16 lb prime rib for the holidays and needed a carving knife. The case that comes with the knife is nice and keeps it easy to store the knife. When I first used it I was so surprised how easily it cut through the meat. My siblings nearby even remarked the same sentiment. It was like cutting through butter. During the holidays we had tested this knife against a cimitar and it was no contest. Nice and even pieces were cut using this knife.
customer_reviews.author: Duke Tran

customer_reviews.title: Value for money is second to none. Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality for the money. This product was absolutely much much better than I ever expected. I did not have high expectations because the price was low. This things came super sharp. It slices through barbecue like like it is butter. It is nice and heavy. Made with good materials and was clearly made with care. Best value product I've ever bought on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Trombetti

customer_reviews.title: Eh, nothing special
customer_reviews.text: Not very sharp as I'd hope, woukd pull the brisket when trying to cut, maybe I got a bad one, idk?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful knife and razor sharp
customer_reviews.text: Best value for sure, they definitely didn’t spare and expensive with this knife. It’s wicked sharp and looks fancy in it’s case which is surprisingly nice, I used it easily over a dozen times so far and haven’t had to sharpen it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Paper thin slicing is a breeze
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a slicing knife to make those very thin slices of smoked salmon. I have found one in Mairico Ultra sharp stainless steel carving knife. This will be the only knife to have for slicing ultra-thin slices of any fish item.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfhound Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Size, feel and sharpness,
customer_reviews.text: Great slicing knife. Size and feel is really nice. Very sharp (ask one of my fingers). Price is very good for the quality of the knife. I actually bought one extra for a friend and he is very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Danson G. Tolman

customer_reviews.title: Dull with edge damage - save your money or spend more
customer_reviews.text: Knife was not sharp when delivered. There was aparent edge damage and it did not cut well the first time I used it. Save your money or spend more on something better.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Junk!!! Run away!!!
customer_reviews.text: Complete garbage of a knife... Was sharp for a day, used it to slice a pork loin... washed it and put it away... Next use it wouldn’t even get through a TOMATO... Missed the return date by 1 day, or else it would have gone back... DO NOT BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Sharp only the first time you use it
customer_reviews.text: The edge of the blade dulls very quickly on this. I didn't expect much for the price but hoped it would stay sharp a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: JSS

customer_reviews.title: Good knife
customer_reviews.text: Feels great and was a great conversation piece just expected more sharpness than what it delivered. I used it to cut the turkey and was a little disappointed in having to saw instead of one easy slice. Will sharpen it and try again. Just couldnt give it a 5 star for that. Turkey was moist just to clarify.
customer_reviews.author: mike lenoir

customer_reviews.title: Priced Right for the Quality Level
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of similar knives on Amazon and in stores, but many of them tend to be very expensive. This one was on the lower priced end of spectrum, and it works just fine. It's not a replacement for a high quality $150 knife, but for our kitchen, it does just fine.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: This knife is exactly what we were looking for. Such an amazing value. We were not expecting that quality for the price. We have professional knives and we smoke a lot of large cuts of meats, and this knife cuts through them like butter thick or paper thin. Very happy. May get another. Would be an amazing gift.!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Fowler

customer_reviews.title: You get amazing slices every time
customer_reviews.text: You get a perfect slice every time you use this. It cuts thick or ultra thin. I love thinly sliced BBQ for making a perfect sandwich. The box it comes in makes it easy to store after use. It slices with little effort and is extremely sharp. Perfect for cutting steaks, pork loins, brisket or any other of your favorite meats.
customer_reviews.author: Elbabub

customer_reviews.title: Great Knife For The Price
customer_reviews.text: I read a couple of the 3 star reviews on this knife and truly don't understand some people's feedback. The knife I received is comparable to many knives I've purchased in the $70 range. If your standard is a $150-$170 knife no the finish and materials don't reach that level but then your purchasing a $25 knife so get real. HOWEVER this is an EXCELLENT knife for $25 easily comparing to many in the $65-$70 range. I would definitely recommend it and don't have any plans to replace it. If you want a nice slicing knife but don't want to spend above the $70 range then this is a win.
customer_reviews.author: Brennan M.

customer_reviews.title: Quality knife at a quality price!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the knife for my grilling obsessed husband and so far he loves it! He’s been able to cut through his briskets with no issues. The quality of the knife shows in its craftsmanship, it is sturdy and durable, and I believe will last us a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Vanesa M Gaddis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent knife
customer_reviews.text: This knife is very well made. Nice features and cuts beautifully and effortlessly. It comes in a nice storage case for easy put a way. I would definitely purchase this item again. The only reason recommendations would be to design a security feature to keep knife secure and in place when opening the case. It is packaged well, but falls out of the mold easily if you open the wrong end. Aside from that, great knife!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really enjoying this knife so far. It's very sharp out of the box, and after a number of uses, it has kept it's edge. It's weight and balance beat my expectations. Although there are definitely better knives out their, I doubt you'd find a better value out there (for non-pro use).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fer' slicin' meat
customer_reviews.text: Got this because I smoke briskets, ribs and bake the occasional Beef Wellington. This sliced through the Crust of the puff pastry and filet with ease without tearing up any of the bread or meat. It made for quite the presentation.
customer_reviews.author: Murphy the Dog

customer_reviews.title: Worst knife EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: Worst knife ever This knife couldn't cut thru the wind if needed Easily can run my hand down the" extremely sharp" edge without any worry of a scratch much less a cut. Safe for children and infants to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Dyson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Carving Knife
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a carving knife like this at local stores for years. Finally had the notion to look on Amazon and here it was. Got it in and used it to carve the Thanksgiving Ham. I was super impressed with how easily and well it sliced the ham. I really like this knife and the quality of it.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Looks to be very well made
customer_reviews.text: Looks to be a very well crafted knife. I haven’t had opportunity to use it yet, but it does look to be very well made. If the steel and tempering measure up to the overall appearance, it should prove to be an excellent carving knife.
customer_reviews.author: Sneaky Pete

customer_reviews.title: IT'S A CUT ABOVE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this knife to carve into our Thanksgiving turkey. It arrived in a very nice case and the knife was already sharp. i washed it and during that wipe, I was surprised by the balance and solid build of the product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Great carving knife, excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Was very hesitant about this knife, and boy let me tell ya it's sharp as hell, we got it for carving a brisket, ribs, etc ! Was like a hot knife thru butter. Very pleased with the performance, I recommend this knife to anyone, great quality, should last for years to come!!
customer_reviews.author: william burger

customer_reviews.title: this knife sliced right through the meat like butter. definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: just used this for the first time on some dino ribs that i smoked. this knife sliced right through the meat like butter. definitely recommend, especially at this price point!
customer_reviews.author: bobby g.

customer_reviews.title: Blade arrived bent.
customer_reviews.text: Blade arrived with a bend in it. Returned for replacement. Replacement blade arrived. This second blade is straight but not exactly in line with the handle. I’m keeping this one. Considering the price it is acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Shadow

customer_reviews.title: How did I not have one of these before?
customer_reviews.text: I make a lot of meats in my smoker, including bacon, pastrami and smoked turkey. The one issue I always had was how to get thin, even slices. This knife completely solves that problem! I have no idea how I didn't buy one of these way sooner. It makes cutting thin, even slices a breeze! This specific knife seems to be very sturdy, with a sharp edge straight from the box. I have used it 4 times so far and have been very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Linsmeier

customer_reviews.title: Best accessory/kitchen tool I’ve purchased
customer_reviews.text: I’m not one to usually write reviews but lately I’ve decided to start doing more grilling/smoking. While browsing Amazon for kitchen utensils, this one was the first to catch my eye. This knife was perfect for carving a brisket and slicing ribs that I cooked over the weekend. The handle wasn’t uncomfortable and the blade was so sharp it felt like cutting butter. The blade also seems very durable and I should get many years of usage out of it. I highly recommend purchasing this and I’ll encourage my friends and family to buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Dickens

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product!!! Especially for the price! I was in the search for an electric carver for Thanksgiving turkey, but none of the electric knives had very good reviews. I found a few specialty carving knives that had amazing reviews and decided to test my luck out on the more affordable product (especially since we only use it once a year). I couldn't be happier!! My uncle carved the turkey like it was butter. I carved a roast the other night with it and it was amazing! EXTREMELY SHARP!!! Do not even try to run your finger along it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C.

customer_reviews.title: What a sharp knife you have!
customer_reviews.text: Great knife. Fits just right in your hand. Nice length from handle to tip. It took about twenty to thirty strokes on the sharpening block to get it just rite. Overall I am satisfied with this knife.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Good knife overall
customer_reviews.text: I expected it to be a little sharper to be honest. It’s pretty good. I got this for slicing brisket and other meats. It does a pretty good job. I like the box so I can store the knife when not using it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Adams

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I use this knife everyday in my food truck. Light weight and keeps its edge pretty good. It’s a good knife
customer_reviews.author: Tim Gerald

customer_reviews.title: Good slicing knife
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my Thanksgiving turkey. Perhaps a little bit too big but it did work well. I think it would be even better with roasts and similar cuts of meat. I even used it to slice pumpkin bread.
customer_reviews.author: PJCAI

customer_reviews.title: Brisket time? Get this knife!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent knife! Smooth cutting and very well made. Beautiful storage case also. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Luis A. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I have only used the knife one time, but it did a great job. Used it to carve turkey and it cut through it very easily, I was able to cut perfect slices, which I have not been able to do with any other knife in the past. Very sharp, and appears to be good quality product, storage box is great addition to help keep it in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: John Spies

customer_reviews.title: This is a good slicing knife
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have much experience with higher end knives, but this one works for me. It’s sharp and it’s well balanced. I used it to cut a dry aged New York strip loin, which was very tough on the outside. It sliced through it with ease and made some beautiful steaks!
customer_reviews.author: BuyerOfThings

customer_reviews.title: Good knife but needed sharpening
customer_reviews.text: Knife looks nice and feels good only complaints are it would be nice to have a blade covering sheath instead of keeping it in the box. Other complaint is I actually had to sharpen the knife it was very dull.
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: This knife is amazing. I'm a no shame
customer_reviews.text: This knife is amazing. I'm a no shame, self professed foodie, aspiring chef and part-time caterer. There are lots of other brisket/slicing knives I've heard of and read about that are double and sometimes even triple the price, which left me skeptical at first when I purchased this. However, it is a gorgeous knife. Heavy, well balanced, super sharp. I use this knife on any roast/large cook I do and it is wonderful! Will definitely be buying more. I wish they were on Instagram as I'd love to shout em out!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chuck M

customer_reviews.title: Very good slicing knife
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how I was able to slice meat without a long carving knife before. This knife is a game changer. Good construction and weight. I like the balance and it holds it edge well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Don Quixote

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Very, very pleased with this knife. Bought it specifically to cut smoked brisket and it worked marvelously for that purpose. Weight and balance is very nice in the hand and slices well with minimal effort. Looking forward to trying on other types of meat.
customer_reviews.author: D P Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Good knife for the money, but not premium grade.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice knife. It came very sharp from the factory. The initial sharpness I think wore down too quickly, but it's still very good, and I have no problem sharpening my own knives.
customer_reviews.author: Chrisp

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Just got it and have only used it twice so far. Very sharp and glides throug the meat like butter. Love the box it came in which is great for storing the knife. Great knife for the money.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Bembenek

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp knife
customer_reviews.text: I gave you a good review and I haven't even used the knife yet but I will be this weekend but it looks nice and it is very sharp so I don't think I will have a problem thx for the service
customer_reviews.author: felix wooden

customer_reviews.title: THE KNIFE
customer_reviews.text: This knife has it's own place in BBQ Drawer. Used every week I BBQ/Smoke anything... It stays in the original box, hand washed, cleaned up and put away... Repeat Often.. :-) Best Carver Yet!!!!
customer_reviews.author: PM95650

customer_reviews.title: It is recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had much time with slicer yet, but I used it once to cut a sushi roll and it was smooth in cut it. I look forward to many more chances to test it. Well built and solid in design. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Best knife we have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This is the Best knife that we have ever used, I recommend this knife to everyone. We are big smokers and grillers and this knife cuts through brisket, ribs, sausage, steak you name it like butter. I cannot say enough good things about this knife. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: OK at best
customer_reviews.text: The knife has a decent weight to it but out of the box was not sharp at all. I may update my review after sharpening it myself but I shouldn't have to do that and it should come sharpened. If you want something that you can use right out of the box, I would not recommend this blade.
customer_reviews.author: Chris R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Blade
customer_reviews.text: The Ultra Sharp Premium 11-inch Stainless Steel Carving Knife is a thing of beauty. It is well designed, light and blade is sharp and cuts clean through the beef with hardly any effort and is ergonomically sound. It is the best blade for the buck. I am totally satisfied with its performance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: performance
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this knife. Once I starting using it I couldn't stop. It slices so thin I can see thru the meat or thick as you want it. Would recommend this product to anyone who spends time in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: mac attack

customer_reviews.title: High quality, nice presentation and Sharp!
customer_reviews.text: This knife appears to be of exceptional quality for a great price. It has a good weight and balance, cut nicely right out of the box and came in a professional presentation in its own box
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this knife, and so far I couldn't be happier with it. Naturally, I'll be interested in finding out how long it holds and edge, but I don't anticipate having to do more than periodic sharpening. Take it from a foodie: this knife is an excellent buy and works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lafferty

customer_reviews.title: Nice slicing on bigger hunks of meat
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a great knife for carving larger hunks of meat, arrived quickly and was pretty sharp. Low cost but seems to be worth it will update as time passes on how it hold its edge
customer_reviews.author: scootertrash1500

customer_reviews.title: good knife at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: good knife at a good price. I've used it to carve up a couple tri-tip roasts super thin so far - so satisfying.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Lindborg

customer_reviews.title: It can cut soft butter nice
customer_reviews.text: The edge on this nice is very poor. Dull and unevenly ground. Get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent knife
customer_reviews.text: For a guy with mostly Henkel and Wusthof knives, I was very pleased with the quality of this slicer. You can't go wrong with this knife at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice knife. I have not used it on what I bought it for. I did use it to cut some cantaloupe and it went through it like a hot knife cutting butter
customer_reviews.author: Rueben Morales

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Sharp, But Could Have A Better Edge
customer_reviews.text: It is a decent knife. It's very sharp out of the box, but it could use a better edge. I recently used it to slice turkey, and it did a good job, but could've been sharper.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great knife
customer_reviews.text: Ive used my new knife 3-4 times since ive got it and its a great knife, I should have had one years ago, very happy and I will spread the word to my friends and family
customer_reviews.author: Dave Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Good knife
customer_reviews.text: Very easy knife to use, slices we'll, great knife for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Cuts

customer_reviews.title: Good value but knife is not sharp enough
customer_reviews.text: Recommend buying a knife sharpener to go with this knife. Was not very sharp and had a hard time cutting my brisket without smashing it.
customer_reviews.author: Realistic Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: A great looking knife!
customer_reviews.text: I can't rate the knife for usability, since I just got it today, but man, it is a great looking knife and it feels good to handle. I can't wait to use it and I will be submitting another review after Thanksgiving after I have sliced my brisket. I've never had a good carving knife and I'm expecting this one to be a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this bread knife it cut 200 lbs of prime rib like it was butter needless to say looks fantastic in our kitchen a must have for any Caterer
customer_reviews.author: Hanssnowlo69

customer_reviews.title: Nice box, sharp
customer_reviews.text: Bought to slice brisket, haven't tried it on Turkey yet. Feels sharp. Nice box. Sliced full packer brisket just fine.
customer_reviews.author: West Coast Gen X

customer_reviews.title: Sharp knife, great price
customer_reviews.text: Knife is very sharp! Easily cuts through meat like butter. It is one of my favorite knifes for cutting rubs and brisket. Would recommend especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Great carving knife
customer_reviews.text: Love this knife. Carves meat flawlessly. I only wish it came with a storage sleeve. It’s too long for my knife block.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen D

customer_reviews.title: You will love this, click b
customer_reviews.text: You will love this knife! If you are into cooking, the way that we are in this house, this kitchen utensil is a must. It was delivered quickly, in nice packaging; it is very sharp, with a handle that feels solid; and best of all, it is affordably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It worked great! The first time.. It still works good just not as good as the very first time I used it.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Meh, fancy presentation got me
customer_reviews.text: Isn’t sharp and that’s what I should have known from such an inexpensive knife. I’d say it’s probably about as good as any $10 slicing knife on here. Don’t waste the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Kristal Gage

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced and works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I used the knife on a turkey and a pork roast. Very effective on both. Nice thin slices on the pork roast.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: What a knife!
customer_reviews.text: This is a legit knife. I bought a smoker last week and needed something to carve the meat. This knife does the job very nicely and for the money, it gives you good value. Plus it has its own cool box for storage!
customer_reviews.author: pblack29

customer_reviews.title: Great Knife
customer_reviews.text: This knife is amazing. Super sharp, easy to hold and use. It definitely will get lots of use.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: it cuts through everything easily
customer_reviews.text: I bought this knife especially for my husband when cutting rack of baby back ribs. We love it and it is basically the only knife we use now.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne M. Ogershok

customer_reviews.title: Great knife
customer_reviews.text: I bought this knife specifically for carving up my bbq’d meats and it has been a good choice. I like that it’s longer and more maneuverable than my Shun chef knife. It is well balanced and easy to use. Blade is very sharp and time will tell how it holds up. I generally spend more for higher quality knives but am definitely not disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MDW

customer_reviews.title: Good knofr
customer_reviews.text: I finally got use this for brisket the other day. It worked really well. I look forward to using it more.
customer_reviews.author: davidah64d

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: It was extremely sharp day I bought it. But after maybe 3 uses it feels like it needs to be sharpened already. Im worried about the longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

product_meta.title: MAIRICO Ultra Sharp Premium 11-inch Stainless Steel Carving Knife - Ergonomic Design - Best for Slicing Roasts, Meats, Fruits and Vegetables
product_meta.description: MAIRICO slicing knife is professionally designed and delivers impeccable performance. Its blade is made of 10 inches superb quality, premium stainless steel.The ultra sharp blade is engineered to cut through precisely with minimal effort and is built to last. This slicing knife works well with different types of meat. The length of the blade is preferred by professionals to cut through brisket, pork loins, turkey, ham, smoked salmon and roasts. It is versatile and can be used to slice fruits and vegetables as well. It is also ergonomically designed, with a well-balanced weight distribution and secure grip to make you safe and comfortable. We are confident that you will love using this bread knife, or simply return it for a full refund. You have nothing to lose, so go ahead and add to your cart!
feature_bullets: IMPECCABLE PERFORMANCE: The long, ultra sharp blade is engineered to deliver highly precise cuts with minimal effort.

PROFESSIONAL DESIGN, SUPERB QUALITY: Most desirable length by professionals. Sharp blade with premium stainless steel engineered to excel on all cuts of meats, including big roasts. It is also designed to last.
ERGONOMIC DESIGN: Provides well-balanced weight distribution and secure grip to make you safe and comfortable. Fits perfectly in your hand.

VERSATILE: This 11” slicing knife works well with different types of meat. Long enough to cut through brisket, pork loins, turkey, ham, smoked salmon and roast. It can also be used to slice fruits and vegetables.
TOP PERFORMANCE GUARANTEE: We're confident you'll find the knife amazing, delivering enjoyable feel to each cut. But if you're not happy for whatever reason, simply return it for a FULL REFUND.
